body:
To Staff of Avicus

i was playing a normal game of nebula and this kid came along using kill aura i manged to kill him becuase i had full iron after i said can you turn the kill aura off please and someone must have reported me becuase i got a warning and i dont know why so could you please remove that infraction off my list becuase no one has told me the rules so if someone could give me the rules that would be very helpful.

Mrme2298

:')

:')
title: About hacking

replies.body:
*sigh*
You still did it... it's your fault for not reading the rules or making attempt to try and find them. It was even plastered on the forum to not publicly accuse players of hacking and a rule is a rule, regardless of if you read them or not. As for accusing players of hacking, the player may realize they've been caught and turn it off trying to be "sneaky" and saying someone hacks globally will potentially make them turn it off due to suspicion of them being recorded or caught by staff. If you wish to appeal an infraction, please email support@avicus.net with your username and a little appeal message.

Read the rules here at https://avicus.net/rules.

If you wish to appeal an infraction, please email support@avicus.net with your username and a little appeal message.

Read the rules here at https://avicus.net/rules.

replies.body:
www.avicus.net/rules

Also, it is the players job to know the rules, your infraction will not be appealed.
